properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 29800
| extend Name =  extract("Name=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    UserName = user,
    ["Object Name"] = Name,
   MessageDetails = Description,
   Severity = SeverityDescription
properties.name: Archive Repository Settings Updated
properties.description: Detects when archive repository settings are updated in Veeam Backup & Replication. This might indicate configuration changes that require review.
